name: Popcat clicker (NorielSylvire)
description:
Popcat has decided to go on an adventure to make as many pops as humanly -or catly- possible. Help Popcat realize their dream of becoming the ULTIMATE POPMASTER.

As Popcat always says, when it goes pop there is no stop.

My grandmother used to tell me: "When it goes pop there is no stop."

This project is incomplete and was made for a game development course I'm doing with an amazing teacher!

I plan on adding juiciness to it soon!

Prepare for MORE POPS, MORE JUICE, MORE CATS, and especially, MORE POPS!!!
